executive_summary: Somanth is a 43-year-old male with Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus (T1DM) presenting with an HbA1c of 8.1%, indicating suboptimal glycemic control. Key priorities include improving glycemic control, managing lipid levels, and addressing lifestyle factors to reduce the risk of complications.

labs_table.comment: Above target, indicating poor glycemic control.
Fasting plasma glucose is within normal range.
Creatinine level is within normal limits.
Total cholesterol is above optimal levels.
HDL cholesterol is within normal range.

interpretation.assessment: Current HbA1c is above the target for T1DM, indicating a need for improved diabetes management.
interpretation.plan: Implement a structured diabetes management plan including medication, lifestyle changes, and regular monitoring.

interpretation.assessment: Lipid levels indicate a high cardiovascular risk.
interpretation.plan: Consider statin therapy and dietary modifications to improve lipid profile.

lifestyle_plan.text: Increase physical activity to at least 150 minutes of moderate exercise per week.
Aim for 7-9 hours of sleep per night to improve overall health.

diet_plan.principles: Focus on a balanced diet rich in whole foods, low in processed sugars and saturated fats.
sample_meals: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens and vinaigrette
Quinoa with roasted vegetables and a lean protein source
Oatmeal topped with berries and nuts
diet_plan.portion_guidance: Use a plate method to balance carbohydrates, proteins, and vegetables.

monitoring_plan.glucose_targets: Aim for pre-meal glucose levels of 4-7 mmol/L and post-meal levels of <8.5 mmol/L.
monitoring_plan.testing_frequency: Test blood glucose at least 4 times a day.
monitoring_plan.safety_checks: Regularly check for signs of hypoglycemia and adjust insulin as necessary.

patient_goals: Achieve an HbA1c of <7.0% within 6 months.
Reduce LDL cholesterol to <2.0 mmol/L within 6 months.
Increase physical activity to 150 minutes per week within 3 months.

medication_plan.text: Consider starting insulin therapy to better manage blood glucose levels.
Discuss the initiation of statin therapy for lipid management.

follow_up.actions: Reassess HbA1c, lipid levels, and overall diabetes management.

emr_note: Patient Somanth, 43, T1DM, presents with HbA1c 8.1%, elevated LDL and total cholesterol. Recommendations include lifestyle modifications, potential insulin therapy, and statin consideration.
